2081.subject: CANT
2081.descrlong: Alternative assessment for the second semester of Cantonese. Freshmen and sophomore transfers attempting to satisfy the Language ULR through assessment must enroll in CANT 101, 102, 201, and 202 concurrently, except for international students who may enroll only in CANT 202. Junior and senior transfers attempting to satisfy the Language ULR through assessment, must enroll in CANT 101, 102, and 201, except for international students who may enroll only in CANT 201 or 202.
